# Government Tender Announcement for Costing and Negotiation Services in Support of MHP

**Title:** Costing and Negotiation Services in Support of Maritime Helicopter Program (MHP)
**Tender Reference Number:** W8485-TSPS2024-09/A
**Amendment Number:** 5
**Publication Date:** 2023-10-26
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-30 14:00:00
**Project Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) requirement to assess the sustainment costs of the CH-148 Maritime Helicopter fleet and develop a CH-148 Cyclone Helicopter strategy for negotiations with the ISS supplier. The project involves estimating the cost of various options as they are negotiated.

**Services Provided:**

* Senior Project Leader/Executive
* Up to three Senior Business Analysts

**Security Clearance:**

The contractor must hold a Canadian Reliability Clearance (RC) with a minimum security level of RELIABILITY.

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Procurement Method:**

Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria:**

The selection criteria will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price, with the highest combined rating being awarded the contract.

**Contract Duration:**

The proposed contract period will be from the contract award date to a date specified at contract award, followed by two option periods of one year each.

**Estimated Level of Effort:**

The estimated level of effort for each resource will be 220 days for the initial contract period and 220 days per year for each option period.

**GSIN Description:**

Management advisory services (80100000)

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Canada

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Daniel Guindon
* A/DAP 9-5
* Daniel.Guindon2@forces.gc.ca
